types.name: reason
types.description: Reason code or name for an event (when result=Succeeded) or error (when result=Failed). Unlike the `reasonDesc` field, this should be a stable/predictable name for a class of events or errors (typically the exception name, e.g. FileIOException).

types.name: reasonDesc
types.description: Error message detail. May contain arbitrary message details (unlike the `reason` field), but should be truncated (recommendation: 200 chars).

types.name: duration
types.description: The duration of the operation in miliseconds

metrics.name: metadata_hasResult
metrics.description: It does not actually have a result, yep
